name: part_001
file: tmp_大神ミオ２周年記念３Dライブ【2nd anniversary】 [mmUVwNut2-Y]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Ookami Mio performs 'Kirameki Rider☆' during her 2nd anniversary 3D live.
MC section where Mio greets the audience and talks about her 2nd anniversary.

subtitles.original: キラメキライダー☆
subtitles.english: Kirameki Rider☆

subtitles.original: 春風が吹き抜けたんだ みんなで歌おう
subtitles.english: The spring breeze blew through, let's all sing together

subtitles.original: 終わらないメロディ
subtitles.english: ...an endless melody.

subtitles.original: きらめきに乗って ふらめき纏って
subtitles.english: Riding the sparkle, wearing the flutter,

subtitles.original: 揺らめき纏って
subtitles.english: wearing the shimmer.

subtitles.original: Yeah!
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: キラメキライダーでした！
subtitles.english: That was Kirameki Rider!

subtitles.original: というわけで...
subtitles.english: And so...

subtitles.original: ...みなさーん！こんばんみぉーん！
subtitles.english: ...everyone! Good evening-mio!

subtitles.original: 大神ミオでーす！
subtitles.english: This is Ookami Mio!

subtitles.original: Yeah!
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: あ、みんなすごい。2周年お祝いしてくれて本当にどうもありがとう。
subtitles.english: Ah, you guys are amazing. Thank you so much for celebrating my 2nd anniversary.

subtitles.original: そ、ちょっと1曲目からね、激しめな曲だったので少し息が上がっております。
subtitles.english: I'm a bit out of breath because the first song was so intense.

subtitles.original: あ！あ、ちょっとおもらししちゃいましたね。
subtitles.english: Ah! Ah, I leaked a little bit, didn't I?

subtitles.original: すみません。ははは。
subtitles.english: Sorry. Hahaha.

subtitles.original: パチパチありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Thank you for the applause.

subtitles.original: いや、2周年ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Man, thank you for these two years.

subtitles.original: 本当に応援してくれるみなさんのおかげで、3年目をこれから歩き出そうとしております。
subtitles.english: Thanks to all of you who support me, I'm about to start my third year.

subtitles.original: ちょっとね、あのこれから曲続くんですけどもね、
subtitles.english: There are more songs coming up, but

subtitles.original: ちょいちょいMCを挟みながらみんなと今日は楽しんでいけたらいいなと思っておりますので、どうぞよろしくお願いいたします。
subtitles.english: I'll have some MC breaks here and there. I hope we can all have fun together today!

subtitles.original: というわけで、早速2曲目いっちゃおうかな？ちょっとおもらししちゃったけど。
subtitles.english: So, shall we get right into the second song? Even though I leaked a bit.

subtitles.original: じゃあ、2曲目お願いします！
subtitles.english: Alright, here is the second song!

subtitles.original:
Don't say "lazy"
作詞：大森祥子 / 作曲：前澤寛之
subtitles.english:
Don't say "lazy"
Lyrics: Shoko Omori / Composition: Hiroyuki Maezawa

subtitles.original: Please don't say you are lazy
subtitles.english: Please don't say you are lazy

subtitles.original: だって本当はcrazy
subtitles.english: Because I'm actually crazy

subtitles.original: 白鳥たちはそう 見えないところでバタ足するんです
subtitles.english: Swans, you see, paddle hard where no one can see

subtitles.original: 本能に忠順忠実
subtitles.english: Obedient and faithful to instinct

subtitles.original: 煩悩も重々承知
subtitles.english: Fully aware of my own desires

subtitles.original: 前途洋々だし だからたまに休憩したいんです
subtitles.english: The future is bright, so I want to rest sometimes

subtitles.original: Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey!
subtitles.english: Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey!

subtitles.original: この目でしっかり見定めて 行き先
subtitles.english: Identify the destination clearly with these eyes,

subtitles.original: 地図上マークして
subtitles.english: marking it on the map.

subtitles.original: 近道あれば それが王道
subtitles.english: If there's a shortcut, that's the royal road.

subtitles.original: 端折れる翼もあれば上等
subtitles.english: Wings that can skip the path are even better.

subtitles.original: ヤバ 爪割れた
subtitles.english: Oh no, I broke a nail.

subtitles.original: グルーで補修した
subtitles.english: Fixed it with some glue.

subtitles.original: それだけで なんか達成感
subtitles.english: I feel a sense of accomplishment just from that.

subtitles.original: 大事なのは自分 かわいがること
subtitles.english: The important thing is to be kind to yourself.

subtitles.original: 自分を愛さなきゃ 他人も愛せない
subtitles.english: If you don't love yourself, you can't love others.

subtitles.original: Please don't say you are lazy
subtitles.english: Please don't say you are lazy

subtitles.original: だって本当はcrazy
subtitles.english: Because I'm actually crazy

subtitles.original: 能ある鷹はそう 見えないところにピック隠すんです
subtitles.english: A skilled hawk hides its pick where no one can see

subtitles.original: 想像に一生懸命
subtitles.english: Putting all effort into imagination

subtitles.original: 現実は絶体絶命
subtitles.english: The reality is a desperate situation

subtitles.original: 発展途上だし だからたまにピッチ外れるんです
subtitles.english: I'm still developing, so I get off pitch sometimes

subtitles.original: Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey!
subtitles.english: Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey!

subtitles.original: どんどんいくぞー！
subtitles.english: Let's keep going!

subtitles.original: この目に映らないだけで
subtitles.english: Just because you can't see it,

subtitles.original: やる気はメーター振り切って
subtitles.english: my motivation is off the charts.

subtitles.original: いつでも全力で夢見て
subtitles.english: Always dreaming with all my might,

subtitles.original: その分全力で眠って
subtitles.english: sleeping just as hard afterwards.

subtitles.original: やり遂げた感で
subtitles.english: With a sense of achievement,

subtitles.original: 調子づいて食った
subtitles.english: I got carried away and ate too much.

subtitles.original: それだけで 何で敗北感
subtitles.english: Why do I feel so defeated just from that?

subtitles.original: すかさずに目標を下方修正して
subtitles.english: Quickly lowering my goals,

subtitles.original: 柔軟に臨機応変 七変化が勝ち
subtitles.english: flexibility and adaptation are key to winning.

subtitles.original: Please don't say you are lazy
subtitles.english: Please don't say you are lazy

subtitles.original: だって本当はcrazy
subtitles.english: Because I'm actually crazy

subtitles.original: 孔雀たちはそう ここぞという時美を見せるんです
subtitles.english: Peacocks, you see, show their beauty when it matters most

subtitles.original: 五臓六腑邁進
subtitles.english: Pushing forward with my whole soul

subtitles.original: 願望は疎志ネジ
subtitles.english: Desire is the engine

subtitles.original: 誘惑多発しだし だからやけに意志砕けちゃうんです
subtitles.english: Temptations keep coming, so my will easily breaks

subtitles.original: Woo!
subtitles.english: Woo!

subtitles.original: みんな楽しんでるかー！
subtitles.english: Is everyone having fun?!

subtitles.original: すごいよー！
subtitles.english: This is amazing!

subtitles.original: ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！
subtitles.english: Hai! Hai! Hai! Hai!
